snippet: A leading human rights activist in Haiti has been threatened for his work, Amnesty International said Tuesday, marking the latest documented case of attacks or threats against watchdog groups in the Caribbean nation....

headline.print_headline: Amnesty: Haiti Human Rights Activist Threatened
headline.main: Amnesty: Haiti Human Rights Activist Threatened

lead_paragraph: A leading human rights activist in Haiti has been threatened for his work, Amnesty International said Tuesday, marking the latest documented case of attacks or threats against watchdog groups in the Caribbean nation.
